metadata.title: CVE-2016-10515 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Redmine before 3.2.3, there are stored XSS vulnerabilities affectingTextile and Markdown text formatting, and project homepages.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
